rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with ample space for storage and display, incorporating natural light through large glass doors.
An open-plan living area designed to maximize natural ventilation and daylight, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for morning sun in accordance with Vastu principles.
Modern kitchen with a streamlined layout, incorporating energy-efficient appliances and natural light through skylights, oriented towards the north to enhance functionality.
Adjacent to the kitchen, this space provides a seamless dining experience with glass partitions to ensure continuity with the living area while adhering to privacy standards.
Compact room for laundry and storage, positioned strategically near water outlets and waste disposal systems, designed for efficient workflow.
Spacious bedroom designed for comfort and relaxation, featuring ample closet space and a balcony to enhance natural light.
Secondary bedroom that is flexible in use, can serve as guest room or office, integrating elements of privacy while ensuring airflow.
Additional bedroom that emphasizes relaxation and minimalistic design with a focus on natural ventilation.
Modern bathroom featuring energy-efficient fixtures, designed with Vastu principles to ensure proper drainage and airflow.
Compact guest bathroom ensuring convenience and privacy for visitors.
Expansive rooftop terrace designed for relaxation and social gatherings, incorporating built-in seating areas and greenery to enhance the natural aesthetic.
